name: Yugo Puzzle (itch)
description:
Yugo Puzzle is a simple 2D puzzle game involving jelly blocks. Move jellies left or right and join them with the same color. It looks easy but it is actually a challenging game.

Features:

  • Mouse only controls
  • Simple graphics
  • Dark mode and color custom settings supported
  • Jellies jump

You can go deep in thought and enjoy it alone, or you can discuss the levels with your friends.
